question: Which of the following was a devoted follower of Naqshbandiya Sufi Khwaja Ubaidullah Ahrar?
explanation:
Babur was an orthodox Sunni but he was neither bigoted and nor led by religious divines. He was a devoted follower of
Naqshbandiya Sufi Khwaja Ubaidullah Ahrar. He was deeply learned in Persian and Arabic.
